name: Vision Loss Rehabilitation Canada - Waterloo and Wellington
comment:
Supports for people living with vision loss * research, public education, and vision health services

Services include:
  • client navigation
  • primary services to support functional needs
  • specialized services
  • concentrated services
  • crisis response and rehabilitation
